Career Profile

Experienced Odoo Technical Lead with over 9 years in Odoo ERP development and Python programming. I specialize in designing, customizing, and deploying reliable Odoo solutions across industries. With a strong understanding of Odoo’s ORM and web frameworks, I create end-to-end ERP solutions to improve business efficiency. I have expertise in integrating third-party applications, optimizing performance, and managing ERP projects from start to finish. Known for a problem-solving approach, effective teamwork, and a commitment to delivering high-quality results that meet client goals.

Experiences

Odoo Technical Lead

May 2023 - Present
Zealous Systems Private Limited, Thimphu, Bhutan

Leading Odoo development projects to deliver tailored ERP solutions that align with business requirements and client goals. My responsibilities include:

  • Conducting requirement analysis, accurate time estimation, and thorough code reviews.
  • Leading system testing, performance optimization, and ensuring secure, stable implementations.
  • Collaborating with project managers on solution design, understanding client needs, and developing enhancements.
  • Overseeing a team of developers, ensuring all technical solutions are robust and aligned with architecture standards.
  • Delivering high-quality, on-time ERP solutions that improve operational efficiency and scalability.

Senior Odoo Developer

September 2022 - April 2023
ICT Direct, Mumbai

Played a key role in Odoo 15 EE customizations for Puro Earth, an environmental marketplace platform, enhancing capabilities across CRM, sales, and finance modules.

  • Designed and implemented a marketplace portal, integrating various functionalities to streamline business workflows.
  • Led customizations for seamless integration, improving overall platform efficiency and client satisfaction.

Senior Software Engineer

May 2022 - September 2022
Future Focus Infotech, Bengaluru

Worked on Nokia’s “IESP EnSO Shop” project, focusing on custom Odoo 14 CE development for enhanced order and resource management.

  • Developed and implemented new features tailored to the needs of the enterprise, improving user experience and functionality.
  • Provided technical mentorship, ensuring the development team adhered to best practices and high coding standards.

Senior Odoo Developer

May 2021 - April 2022
HTIC Global, Kochi

Led a major upgrade for “House of Tours,” transitioning the system from Odoo 11 to Odoo 14, specifically for the travel and tourism industry.

  • Developed and enhanced modules for booking, packages, and customer management, resulting in a streamlined booking process.
  • Ensured seamless integration across multiple systems and provided support for both new and legacy versions.
